title: Firmware v5.0.0.405 for the BlackBerry Bold 9700
description:
----------------------------------------------------------
Latest leaked software v5.0.0.405 for BlackBerry Bold 9700
----------------------------------------------------------


How to install
--------------
1. Extract self-extracting archive
2. Install data package
3. Start "C:Program FilesCommon FilesResearch In MotionAppLoaderLoader.exe"
4. Follow instructions to update your phone firmware

If you are facing any issues with updating your phone, disable all connections on your phone before updating the firmware and disconnect your pc from the internet.
